wikipedia_page.main: Conolly Hugh Gage (10 November 1905 – 3 October 1984) was a British politician and judge.

response: Gage's father was Conolly Gage, a circuit judge. Like his father, William was educated at Repton School and Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge. He was a lieutenant in the Irish Guards during his national service.
